solution_line_template: Robin ate twice as many buttercream cupcakes as chocolate sauce cupcakes, or {multiplier_twice} * {chocolate_cupcakes} = <<{multiplier_twice}*{chocolate_cupcakes}={buttercream_cupcakes}>>{buttercream_cupcakes}.
So in total she ate {chocolate_cupcakes} + {buttercream_cupcakes} = <<{chocolate_cupcakes}+{buttercream_cupcakes}={total_cupcakes}>>{total_cupcakes} cupcakes.
